value: description: Weekly News in the R Community.

Your support will keep R Weekly team moving! 💡

An #rstats #blogdown file hierarchy cheatsheet:

├─ archetypes <- edit me!
├─ config.toml <- edit me!
├─ content <- edit me!
├─ data <- edit me!
├─ layouts <- edit me!
├─ public <- ignore me!
├─ static <- use me! (png/pdf/csv/xls)
├─ themes <- don't touch! pic.twitter.com/gvVA703Lwa

— Alison Hill (@apreshill) December 28, 2018
